TextLibrary.Text: Moarg
Wait! Listen! Before you turn me in, I have an offer for you.
Wait! Listen! Before you turn me in, I have an offer for you.
Wait! Listen! Before you turn me in, I have an offer for you.
Wait! Listen! Before you turn me in, I have an offer for you.
Nothing you say could interest me.
Nothing you say could interest me.
Nothing you say could interest me.
Nothing you say could interest me.
How do you know if you won't hear me out?
How do you know if you won't hear me out?
How do you know if you won't hear me out?
How do you know if you won't hear me out?
I'm warning you... be quiet!
I'm warning you... be quiet!
I'm warning you... be quiet!
I'm warning you... be quiet!
You seek information, am I correct? You want to know where the Undead that plague your lands are coming from, right?
You seek information, am I correct? You want to know where the Undead that plague your lands are coming from, right?
You seek information, am I correct? You want to know where the Undead that plague your lands are coming from, right?
You seek information, am I correct? You want to know where the Undead that plague your lands are coming from, right?
You... you know something?
You... you know something?
You... you know something?
You... you know something?
Oh, I know many things. If you take me back to Skellheim and release me, I will tell you everything.
Oh, I know many things. If you take me back to Skellheim and release me, I will tell you everything.
Oh, I know many things. If you take me back to Skellheim and release me, I will tell you everything.
Oh, I know many things. If you take me back to Skellheim and release me, I will tell you everything.
You're lying.
You're lying.
You're lying.
You're lying.

No, I am not. I am an honest man. Not like your friend Darkhunter back there. He has manipulated you into helping him. Here you are, running to Maethelburg on his orders, when you should be back in the north helping your people.

No, I am not. I am an honest man. Not like your friend Darkhunter back there. He has manipulated you into helping him. Here you are, running to Maethelburg on his orders, when you should be back in the north helping your people.

No, I am not. I am an honest man. Not like your friend Darkhunter back there. He has manipulated you into helping him. Here you are, running to Maethelburg on his orders, when you should be back in the north helping your people.

No, I am not. I am an honest man. Not like your friend Darkhunter back there. He has manipulated you into helping him. Here you are, running to Maethelburg on his orders, when you should be back in the north helping your people.
Tell me what you know. NOW!
Tell me what you know. NOW!
Tell me what you know. NOW!
Tell me what you know. NOW!
Not a chance. I will tell you when I am released in Skellheim, not before. I will even give you a gift - an ancient sword that I think you will find most useful. But you must release me first.
Not a chance. I will tell you when I am released in Skellheim, not before. I will even give you a gift - an ancient sword that I think you will find most useful. But you must release me first.
Not a chance. I will tell you when I am released in Skellheim, not before. I will even give you a gift - an ancient sword that I think you will find most useful. But you must release me first.
Not a chance. I will tell you when I am released in Skellheim, not before. I will even give you a gift - an ancient sword that I think you will find most useful. But you must release me first.
I... I will consider it.
I... I will consider it.
I... I will consider it.
I... I will consider it.
